advancements.label: advancements
advancements.description: The basics of progressing to the next tier usually involves four steps.

types.label: types
types.description: Character type is the core of a character. A type helps determine a character's place in the world and relationship with other people in the setting. It's the noun of the sentence "I am an adjective noun who verbs."

flavors.label: flavors
flavors.description: Flavors are groups of special abilities the GM and players can use to alter a character type to make it more to their liking or more appropriate to the genre or setting
